scripts.build:local: npm install && bun run copy-env && bun run migrate up && bun run start:dev
scripts.build:server: npm install && bun run copy-env && echo HOST=0.0.0.0 > .env.production && bun run migrate up && sudo npm i -g pm2 && pm2 start bun --name "notes-app-back-end" -- run start:prod
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext js --exec "bun run src/server.js"
